metadata.name: Sudo Privilege Escalation CVE-2019-14287 - Builtin
metadata.comment: Detects users trying to exploit sudo vulnerability reported in CVE-2019-14287

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (startswith(lower(actor.user.name), lower('#-')) OR lower(actor.user.name) regexp '#.*4294967295')

output.summary: Detects users trying to exploit sudo vulnerability reported in CVE-2019-14287
